verses.name: Ezekiel 11:21
verses.text: But as for them whose heart walketh after the heart of their detestable things and their abominations, I will recompense their way upon their own heads, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 11:22
verses.text: Then did the cherubims lift up their wings, and the wheels beside them; and the glory of the God of Israel was over them above.

verses.name: Ezekiel 11:23
verses.text: And the glory of the Lord went up from the midst of the city, and stood upon the mountain which is on the east side of the city.
